name: 99 Stocks
description:
Made for

Trijam #99: The 3 hour game jam

Hosted by Trijam, rocknightstudios · #trijam

This game is an awful, unrealistic simulator of the US Stock market. It takes place in an authoritarian democracy, in which the government seizes 99% of investable assets and lets investors keep just 1%. Totally unfair, right?! Real stock names, fake money obviously. Start with $10,000 and try to make some profit.

THIS GAME IS VERY ALPHA!!! THERE'S SO MANY BUGS AND I DO APOLOGIZE BUT I WAS SO DETERMINED TO FINISH THAT I WENT OVER 3 HOURS.....I TOOK 12.75 HOURS. NEXT JAM, I'M AIMING FOR 3.

Yours Truly,

BurterButterBeans Studio 2020
